interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Natwag Makeup Remover Pads,18 Pack 3.74 Inch Reusable Microfiber Cleansing Pad with Laundry Bag Suitable for All Skin Types,3 Color Facial Cleansing Pad Set. Review Date: 2020/07/20 Store: Natwag Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '18.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '18', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 4.37 x 2.59 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569701'} Review Text: I adore these makeup remover rounds. They are the perfect size for a clean face, or even just to remove my eye makeup. No getting water everywhere, no harsh chemicals or cleansers, and there is plenty in this set so that I can just use and wash a new one each time.
They are very soft, but don't let that mislead you. Add some water, and wipe away the day. Flip it to the longer side and buff and exfoliate. Super soft, super clean skin - zero irritations.
Highly recommend and will never be using disposable face wipes again! Review Title: Cleansing Pads Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
30 PCS Blue Hair Care Rollers Hair Curlers Silicone No Clip Hair Style Rollers Soft Magic DIY Curling Hairstyle Tools Hair Accessories ONEONEY {'Item Form': 'Clip', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Brand': 'ONEONEY', 'Unit Count': '30.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 5.31 x 2.68 inches; 8.57 Ounces'} These are an inexpensive and fairly comfortable way to roll my hair at night. It makes getting up and being ready to go in the morning much faster, since all I have to do is unroll, give a spray and shake - and bam waves for days.
However, the quality is decent but not great, one of the rollers looked like it was left out side and got chewed on. But, 1 out of 30 (I counted them) is still good odds for the price.
They came in the matching clear blue zipper bag, and are easy to store. I'd happily purchase another set. Comfy curls AG Care Natural Remedy Apple Cider Vinegar Leave On Mist {'Brand': 'AG Care', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based, Vegan', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair.Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair. See more', 'Product Dimensions': '1.75 x 1.75 x 6 inches; 6.14 Ounces', 'Item model number': '100150', 'UPC': '625336002391', 'Manufacturer': 'AG Hair', 'Country of Origin': 'Canada'} This leave in hair remedy from AG smells wonderful, like a sweet and spicy scent. While it applies strong, it dissipated and left behind a soft clean spicy smell.
It worked really well, and was best when I used it after a work out on damp hair vs dry or showered.
It’s a nice product in my easy care hair Arsenal, I will be picking it up again for my gym bag for sure! Soft hair, smells great! The Sunset Dusk Palette | 15 Color Eye Shadow of BEAUTY GLAZED Eyeshadow Palette | QyeeCosmetics. - Amazon Vine Qyee Cosmetics {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 4.1 x 0.6 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '725714076539'} This is actually a decent palette of eyeshadows. They are not super pigmented, but very easy to work with. This is a very nice beginner palette, especially for the under 10 price.
That said, these need a primer. They last an okay amount of time, but will fade quickly if you don’t use a primer.
Simple cardboard container, very similar to colourpop and bh, but doesn’t have a mirror. Still it’s sturdy and all the pans arrived unbroken!
The shades are arranged nicely, it really has a visual appeal, and makes choosing an eye look easier.
It’s realky not bad, and while my tastes typically run towards the more luxury and pigmented, this is a good entry for a beginner or lighter makeup user.
I will be looking into other palettes by this brand. High 3 stars TOUCH IN SOL Flawless Skin Top Coat 1.18 fl.oz. (35ml) - One Step Makeup (Nourishing Ampoule + High Adhesive Makeup Base + Fresh Silky Powder), Moisturizing High Coverage Foundation (#1 Light) Touch in Sol {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Touch in Sol', 'Coverage': 'Light', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Flawless Skin', 'Package Dimensions': '4 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} My friend recommended this Touch in Sol Flawless skin top coat, and I am so glad she did.
It is really more of a foundation, it has perfect medium coverage. It feels amazing on my skin, light and silky smooth. It leaves me looking matte, but not dry. It's surprisingly radiant.
I use it over the Touch in Sol primer, without setting powder, and it easily lasts the whole day.
So, here I am recommending it to you! Try it! It's amazing! Flawless Foundation 100 pcs Compressed Facial Mask Women DIY Beauty Facial Cotton Paper Compress Masque Disposable Dry Sheet Mask for Skin Face Care Evoio {'Brand': 'Evoio', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Cotton Paper', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Unit Count': '100.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.29 x 4.41 x 2.87 inches; 5.96 Ounces'} I wasn't sure what to expect from these compressed facial masks in terms of quality, as reviews were across the board. But, they far exceeded my needs and expectations!
They are about the size of three dimes stacked, and are embossed with little flowers on top, which is really just a pretty presentation.
They expand easily with moisture, I mixed up my own serum solution with essential oil, and it was easy to soak and unfold. I worried I would have to be super delicate so as not to tear the paper, but these are more of a fabric than tissue.
In fact, I opened one up to test it's durability. I used some warm water, added some dish soap and went to town scrubbing my basin. No tears, no ripping, no holes. (In fact it cleaned up really well). I used some extra pulling pressure on the cut parts, mouth, eyes chin, and as expected had tears and stretching happen, but that was with abnormal applied pressure.
They didn't smell, they didn't feel weird, and they fit great. For the relaxing usage of a home facial these little compact masks are perfect. I know exactly what I'm putting on my face. Super little facial masks! Women Facial Razor for Hair Removal - Dermaplaning Tool Peach Fuzz Trimmer Womens Fine Hair Remover Eyebrow Razors and Dermaplane Face Shavers Women's Exfoliating for Sensitive Skin Essential Travel MODEMODE ["MODEMODE Women's Facial Razor Home Dermaplaning - Eyebrow Razor For Women Face Peach Fuzz Hair Removal Womens Face Exfoliating At Daily Eyebrow Shaping Tool"] {'Brand': 'MODEMODE', 'Number of Blades': '1', 'Unit Count': '5.0 Count', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 1.2 x 0.5 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MODEMODE'} These are some pretty fantastic razors. They are straight edged, but the provided safety edging prevents me from nicking myself while keeping the blade close to my skin.
It removes peach fuzz quickly, efficiently. My skin is super smooth for about a week after use. My makeup goes on like butter, and I am convinced my moisturizers and serums also work better on my dermaplaned skin.
They are small and precision enough that I can use them around my eyebrows, though I go slow and don't usually use them for that.
But for my upper lip, chin, cheeks and forehead I don't know how I got by before these. While my easy to use electric is nice, these are so much closer. Will be a faithful weekly user! Dermaplaning-tastic Mountain Falls Advanced Formula Nail Polish Remover Pads with 96% Acetone, for Natural Nails, 10 Count Mountain Falls {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Pad', 'Item Weight': '0.01 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '10 Count'} I wasn't expecting to love these nearly as much as I do. Thick, large and easily removes all ten nails worth of polish without making my fingers feel overly dried out like using my regular polish remover.
Because they are all individually sealed I can keep one in my bag for any polish removing emergencies, which trust me... they happen.
These work fast, I don't know what makes the formula 'advanced' but the process is quick and clean.
The smell isn't overwhelming, just the basic remover smell. Works great, travels even better. I'll be keeping these on hand! Super Convienent! Natwag Makeup Remover Pads,18 Pack 3.74 Inch Reusable Microfiber Cleansing Pad with Laundry Bag Suitable for All Skin Types,3 Color Facial Cleansing Pad Set. Natwag {'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '18.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '18', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 4.37 x 2.59 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569701'} I adore these makeup remover rounds. They are the perfect size for a clean face, or even just to remove my eye makeup. No getting water everywhere, no harsh chemicals or cleansers, and there is plenty in this set so that I can just use and wash a new one each time.
They are very soft, but don't let that mislead you. Add some water, and wipe away the day. Flip it to the longer side and buff and exfoliate. Super soft, super clean skin - zero irritations.
Highly recommend and will never be using disposable face wipes again! Cleansing Pads
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care & Styling**: The user prioritizes hair styling tools and DIY techniques, particularly favoring soft rollers for overnight use for their convenience. They enhance their routines with leave-in treatments that improve both texture and fragrance.

- **Makeup Interests**: The user has expanded their makeup exploration to include foundations alongside eyeshadows, favoring budget-friendly and easy-to-use products that deliver medium coverage with a focus on a radiant, natural finish. They also prioritize efficient makeup removal solutions that are gentle on the skin.

- **Skincare Exploration**: Recently, the user has shown a keen interest in skincare products that facilitate exfoliation and enhance makeup application. Their focus on effective, user-friendly tools contributes to smoother skin and improved makeup prep.

- **Nail Care**: The user appreciates the convenience of nail polish remover pads and has also embraced reusable makeup remover pads, reflecting a strong preference for practical beauty solutions that simplify their routine.

- **Value for Money**: They emphasize affordability and quality, being open to minor imperfections if the overall value is strong, as evidenced by their detailed product reviews.

- **Ease of Use**: Simplifying their beauty routine remains a priority, focusing on solutions that can be effortlessly integrated into daily life.

- **Storage & Organization**: They prefer easy storage solutions, demonstrating an organized approach to beauty tools and products.

- **Quality Considerations**: The user expects reasonable quality and functionality from products, prioritizing those that align with their lifestyle and provide satisfying experiences. 

Overall, the user maintains a practical and organized approach to beauty, integrating functional and affordable solutions across hair care, makeup, skincare, and nail care into their daily regimen.
